Home Answers.com > Wiki Answers > Categories > Food&Cooking > Restaurants and Dining Establishments > Fast food restaurant do more harm than good food? Fast food restaurant do more harm than good food? In: Restaurants and Dining Establishments [ Edit categories ]
Answer: No they are good for you and they are healthy you should eat at fast food resturants. :]
I'm just kidding they are bad for you did you watch that guy who ate it only for one whole month? He made 30 pounds and it took him 3 months to get skinny again. `

Fast food restaurants do more good than harm ? YESs Do fast foods do more harm than good ? My take is that they do much more harm than good. Fast food does more harm than good ? Yes the food is fast but has tons of grease in it causing your artier to be clogged with bad. Do fast food restaurants do more harm then good ? my it would seem that fast food does do more harm than good. because it could cause some deises Fast food resturants do more harms than goods ? It depends. If you eat it everyday then you will get fat and unhealthy, but if you eat it every other weekend or so it won't affect you as much.
